data.name: unknown_user
data.value:
Hello, I am a RemindMe bot. With RemindMe you can send reminders to yourself or your friends through instant messages and email! Please go to http://www.remindme.cc for more information.
If you have already registered, please be patient. When I receive your registration info I will let you know!

data.name: known_user_default
data.value: Hello %u, please type '/help' or '-help' for information on how to use RemindMe.

data.name: mpserver_request_error
data.value: There has been an internal error, please notify support@remindme.cc with the following error code: (0x01)

data.name: mpserver_response_error
data.value: There has been an internal error, please notify support@remindme.cc wth the following error code: (0x02)

data.name: mpserver_parser_error_1
data.value: The date/time you have specified has already passed. Please try again.

data.name: mpserver_parser_error_2
data.value: I did not understand the date/time you specified. Please try again. If the problem persists, please contact support@remindme.cc

data.name: mpserver_parser_error_3
data.value: You did not specify a date/time. Please try again. If the problem persists, please contact support@remindme.cc

data.name: mpserver_parser_error_4
data.value: You did not specify a message as part of your reminder. Please try again. If the problem persists, please contact support@remindme.cc

data.name: mpserver_parser_error_5
data.value: I did not understand you, please try again. If the problem persists, please contact support@remindme.cc

data.name: mpserver_parser_error_6
data.value: Please use "to", "that" or "about" when sending me your reminders. Example: remind me at 10pm about the meeting in conference room 2b

data.name: create_reminder_failed
data.value: There has been an internal error, please notify support@remindme.cc with the following error code: (0x03)

data.name: max_reminder_error
data.value: I'm sorry but you cannot create any more reminders. You are allowed a total of %d reminders. You can log into www.remindme.cc and delete some reminders.

data.name: reminder_info_IM
data.value:
Details for reminder %d
Creator: %a Delivery Date: %b Message: %c
